set(TARGET_NAME app)
file(GLOB_RECURSE SOURCES src/*.h src/*.cpp src/ui/*.ui)

# This is for files generated by Qt
#set(CMAKE_INCLUDE_CURRENT_DIR ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOUIC ON)

add_executable(${TARGET_NAME} WIN32 ${SOURCES})

find_package(Qt5Widgets REQUIRED)

# Enable visual styles
set_property(TARGET ${TARGET_NAME} APPEND PROPERTY LINK_FLAGS "\"/manifestdependency:type='win32' name='Microsoft.Windows.Common-Controls' version='6.0.0.0' processorArchitecture='*' publicKeyToken='6595b64144ccf1df' language='*'\"")

target_include_directories(${TARGET_NAME} PRIVATE include)
target_link_libraries(${TARGET_NAME} Qt5::Widgets)
